Posts.Content: Sophie56 Hi Sophie, I experiened, migraines, mouth ulcers, vomiting feeling, bone pain. I was told everyone is different so please don't feel all this will happen to you. My friends were different, but please persist drinking water even if you don't want to, as one of my friends ended up in hospital with deyhadtrion. Good luck and take care.
Posts.Title: Someone help please ..chemo side effects
